org.smartfrog.services.www.dbc
Class AbstractDbcDelegate

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.www.dbc.AbstractDbcDelegate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, ApplicationServerContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
DbcEarDelegate, DbcWarDelegate
public abstract class AbstractDbcDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationServerContext

This is the base class for all deploy by copy delegates. It deploys by copying in its start() operation. This is not a Prim derivative; it is a simple POJO that implements ApplicationServerContext Created 19-Jun-2006 16:43:01

start

public void start()
           throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                  java.rmi.RemoteException
Deploy by determining the source file, and doing a blocking copy. If the source file is missing, A SmartFrogDeploymentException with text ApplicationServerContext.ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND is thrown. IOExceptions are passed on nested inside a SmartFrogDeploymentException.

Specified by:
start in interface ApplicationServerContext
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - if the deployment failed
java.rmi.RemoteException - for network problems.

                      throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
Poll for the completed state of the operation

Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException

terminate

public void terminate()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                      org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
Terminate by deleting the destination file. If it cannot be deleted (i.e. the file is locked), we queue a File.deleteOnExit() operation, which may delete it later.

Specified by:
terminate in interface ApplicationServerContext
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - subclasses may throw this
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - subclasses may throw this

ping

public void ping()
          throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogLivenessException,
                 java.rmi.RemoteException
Ping operation checks that the destination file exists

Specified by:
ping in interface ApplicationServerContext
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogLivenessException - if the destination file is absent
java.rmi.RemoteException - subclasses may throw this
